meanings.meaning_en_US: Being the only one of its kind.

examples.sentence: She has a [unique] talent for music.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對音樂有獨特的天賦

examples.sentence: This design is truly [unique].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個設計真的是獨特的

examples.sentence: Each snowflake is [unique] in its form.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每一片雪花在形狀上都是獨特的

meanings.meaning_en_US: A method of collecting information from a group of people.

examples.sentence: The [survey] revealed interesting trends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這項調查顯示了有趣的趨勢。

examples.sentence: Participants were asked to complete the [survey].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 受訪者被要求填寫調查問卷。

examples.sentence: A recent [survey] showed changes in consumer preferences.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 最近的調查顯示了消費者偏好的變化。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To examine or look at closely.

examples.sentence: They will [survey] the area for developments.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將對該地區進行調查以便發展。

examples.sentence: I need to [survey] my options before deciding.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在做決定之前，我需要檢查我的選擇。

examples.sentence: The architect will [survey] the site next week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 建築師將於下週檢查該地點。

meanings.meaning_en_US: For that reason; as a consequence.

examples.sentence: She was late; [therefore], she missed the train.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她遲到了，因此她錯過了火車。

examples.sentence: It rained heavily; [therefore], the match was canceled.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 下了大雨，因此比賽被取消了。

examples.sentence: He studied hard; [therefore], he passed the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他努力學習，因此他通過了考試。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A low area of land between hills or mountains, typically with a river running through it.

examples.sentence: The river flows through the [valley].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 河流流經這個山谷。

examples.sentence: The valley is surrounded by tall mountains.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個山谷四周環繞著高山。

examples.sentence: We hiked down into the [valley] to explore.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們爬下山谷去探險。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A ceremony in which two people are united in marriage.

examples.sentence: Their [wedding] was held in a beautiful garden.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的婚禮在美麗的花園中舉行。

examples.sentence: She wore a stunning dress for the [wedding].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿著一件驚豔的婚紗。

examples.sentence: They invited many friends to their [wedding].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們邀請了許多朋友參加他們的婚禮。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.

examples.sentence: This is a great [opportunity] for you to learn.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是你學習的好機會

examples.sentence: Don't miss the [opportunity] to travel abroad.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要錯過出國旅行的機會

examples.sentence: The job fair provides valuable [opportunities].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那個招聘會提供了寶貴的機會

meanings.meaning_en_US: A set of tools or equipment for a specific purpose.

examples.sentence: He bought a first aid [kit] for emergencies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他為了應急買了一個急救工具包。

examples.sentence: The craftsman used a special [kit] for woodworking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 工匠使用了一個特別的工具包來做木工。

examples.sentence: She needed a repair [kit] to fix the bicycle.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她需要一個修理工具包來修理自行車。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Something given in recognition of achievement.

examples.sentence: She received an [award] for her outstanding performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她因其傑出的表現獲得了一個獎項。

examples.sentence: The ceremony was held to present the [awards].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 頒獎典禮是舉行以頒發獎項。

examples.sentence: Winning the [award] was a surprise for him.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 獲獎對他來說是一個驚喜。

meanings.meaning_en_US: As a result or in this way.

examples.sentence: She studied hard; [thus], she passed the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她努力學習；因此，她通過了考試。

examples.sentence: He was late, [thus] we missed the beginning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他遲到了，因此我們錯過了開始。

examples.sentence: The project was completed early; [thus], we got extra time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 項目提前完成；因此，我們多出了時間。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An estimate of income and expenditure for a set period of time.

examples.sentence: We need to create a [budget] for our trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要為旅行制定預算

examples.sentence: The department has a limited [budget] for supplies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該部門的供應預算有限

examples.sentence: He reviewed the annual [budget] for the company.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他審查了公司的年度預算

meanings.meaning_en_US: The fact or condition of functioning or being active.

examples.sentence: The [operation] of the machine is smooth.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這台機器的運作很順利

examples.sentence: Surgery is a complex [operation].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 外科手術是一個複雜的過程

examples.sentence: The [operation] of the company has improved this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公司的運營在今年有所改善

meanings.meaning_en_US: An alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes or other fruits.

examples.sentence: She enjoys a glass of [wine] with dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在晚餐時喜歡喝一杯葡萄酒。

examples.sentence: Red [wine] pairs well with steak.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 紅葡萄酒與牛排很搭。

examples.sentence: They visited a vineyard to taste the [wine].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們參觀了一家酒莊品嚐葡萄酒。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To express one’s choice or opinion in a formal manner, especially in an election.

examples.sentence: Citizens have the right to [vote] in elections.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公民有權在選舉中投票

examples.sentence: She decided to [vote] for her favorite candidate.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定為她最喜歡的候選人投票

examples.sentence: The committee will [vote] on the new proposal next week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 委員會將在下週對新提案投票

meanings.meaning_en_US: Important and deserving attention.

examples.sentence: The study produced [significant] results.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這項研究產生了重要的結果

examples.sentence: There was a [significant] difference between the two groups.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 兩組之間存在著重要的差異

examples.sentence: His contribution was [significant] to the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的貢獻對這個項目是重要的

meanings.meaning_en_US: The power or right to give orders, make decisions, and enforce obedience.

examples.sentence: The police have the [authority] to enforce the law.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 警察有執法的權力

examples.sentence: She acted with [authority] and confidence.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的行為充滿了權威和自信

examples.sentence: His experience gave him the [authority] to speak on the topic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的經驗使他有權就此話題發言

meanings.meaning_en_US: A plan of action designed to achieve a long-term or overall aim.

examples.sentence: Her [strategy] was to save money for a house.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的策略是存錢買房子。

examples.sentence: The team developed a new [strategy] for marketing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊制定了一個新的行銷策略。

examples.sentence: He analyzed the competition to refine his [strategy].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他分析了競爭對手以完善自己的策略。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who acts on behalf of another person or group.

examples.sentence: The real estate [agent] helped us find a house.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 房地產代理人幫助我們找到一個房子

examples.sentence: He is an undercover [agent] for the police.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是警方的臥底

examples.sentence: An insurance [agent] can provide valuable advice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 保險代理人可以提供有價值的建議

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person in the last year of a course of study, particularly in high school or college.

examples.sentence: He is a [senior] at the university.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是大學的高年級學生。

examples.sentence: The [senior] class is planning a trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 高年級班正在計劃一次旅行。

examples.sentence: As a [senior], she has many responsibilities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 作為一名高年級學生，她有很多責任。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Older or higher in age or rank.

examples.sentence: She took a [senior] position in the company.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在公司擔任一個資深職位。

examples.sentence: The [senior] members of the team led the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊的資深成員負責該專案。

examples.sentence: In a [senior] role, you need to mentor others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在資深角色中，你需要指導他人。
